creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: drawing in black and red; standing figure seen from back, pointing with PL hand, with open mouth and face in profile from PL; man is wearing a sleeveless red garment, boots, and a head scarf; man holds a spear; column in background at right; attached to off white mount sheet
medium: Preparatory drawing for a print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Biographies of Valiant Drunken Tigers (Keisei suikoden 競勢酔虎傳)
title: Preparatory drawing of Kōmyō-ajari
